tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
My moms tooth had been hurting for months. Dr Lilly took time to make her comfortable and procedure painless. Dr Lilly is very caring and understanding towards my mom during our visit. She took the time to explain every procedure she was doing.
She is a professional and has lovely personality.
Her staff (Krishna) is also extremely helpful.
I would recommend Dr. Lilly to everyone. The clinic is also hygienic and properly sanitized, wasn't uncomfortable at all during this pandemic. Thank you Doc.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Highly recommended! I had an extreme pain in my left side lower wisdom tooth. Dr. Lilly was able to analyse the situation and provided very timely help. She has team of expert dental specialists, very professional and friendly. * *** *** ***** painless treatment for my wisdom tooth extraction. I was properly explained about the procedure and their oral surgeon extracted the tooth in no time. Thanks Dr Lilly for being there throughout the treatment.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,

review: Dr.Lilly is a great mixture of professional and friendly approach. The best part is she explained the reason of the problem or the reason for my suffering  and then started treatment accordingly by making me comfortable. Overall the experience was great and the treatment very smooth.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: i got my mothers 4 implant done from Dr.Mukesh at Dr lilly's clinic .The procedure was painless and quick .My mother was very happy and relaxed .After 2 months she has been given a denture over the implant.Thanks god ,my mom is able to eat food again properly without worrying about loose denture .The best part is that she is very friendly and has lots of patience with old patients .THANKS MAM and SIR ,we are no more scared of dentists.
